meanings.definition: Animals that live within the substrate of a body of water.
meanings.sent1: The infaunas in the lake burrow deep into the mud to find food.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the diversity of infaunas living in the riverbed.
meanings.sent3: The infaunas had a party underground, and the fish were not invited!
meanings.sent4: The infaunas are like hidden treasures beneath the surface of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The infaunas create a bustling city beneath the waves, unseen by many.

meanings.definition: The community of organisms that live within the sediment of a marine environment.
meanings.sent1: The infaunas work together to build a thriving ecosystem in the seabed.
meanings.sent2: Divers explore the mysterious world of infaunas beneath the sea.
meanings.sent3: The infaunas held a talent show in the sand, showcasing their hidden talents.
meanings.sent4: The infaunas form a secret society beneath the waves, unknown to most creatures.
meanings.sent5: The infaunas transform the ocean floor into a vibrant community of life.
